titlestmt.author: compiled by Daniel Hartwig

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 08:48

did.unittitle: Study Commission on Governance, Yale University, records

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The records consist of minutes, reports, and correspondence documenting the activities of the Yale University Study Commission on Governance.

origination.label: creator
origination.corpname: Yale University. Study Commission on Governance

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 6 (YRG 6), Records on Yale committees.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Study Commission on Governance, Yale University, Records (RU 530). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The records are arranged by accession.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The records consist of minutes, reports, and correspondence documenting the activities of the Yale University Study Commission on Governance.

controlaccess.corpname: Yale University. Study Commission on Governance
